creditline: Gift of Joanne Leonard in memory and honor of Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg, and in honor of her daughter, Jane C. Ginsburg, and Joanne's daughter, Julia M. Leonard
description: black and white image with a view into a bathroom with toilet and sink on left side of room seen through doorway, with a closed door with a glass doorknob beyond; floral couch with a jacket and towel at left; flowered wallpaper behind floral couch
portfolio: From Human Arts and Technology series
signed: on back in pencil: Joanne Leonard / JOANNE LEONARD
title: Bathroom Seen from Room with Floral Wallpaper
